column4: I want to share data which is availabe on my ubuntu 11.10 machine with a computer running windows operating system...how can i do this?
i can be able to connect to the other pc over my network using "Connecting to Server"
sorry I cannot be able to connect to the other computer over my netwwork using "Connecting to Server"
was that a question or a statement?
:) ok, you must have any of the supported services running on the computer you want to connect to before you can use "Connect to server"
You will see them if you click on Connect to server ;)
I want to use windowshare service  but connection refuese
have you shared anything on that computer? Is the firewall open? Is it accessible from your computer?
and please use the name you are talking to in front of your messages
not yet shared anything with that computer. I am trying to share using connect to server option....
when i try to connect...failed to mount windows share...what is it?
not share WITH, shared FROM, have you checked the other things I told you?
you have to start sharing on the win pc if that is what you are trying to connect to
scarleo..yes i am trying to do that...i off the firewall now
